courses.title: Ballet
courses.description: An introduction to the fundamentals of ballet. Perfect for beginners with no prior experience.

courses.title: Hip-Hop
courses.description: Learn the basic moves and grooves of hip-hop dance. Suitable for all ages.

courses.title: Contemporary
courses.description: For advanced dancers, this course explores contemporary dance techniques and choreography.

courses.title: Salsa
courses.description: Get started with salsa dancing with this beginner-friendly course. No partner required.

courses.title: Jazz
courses.description: Build on your jazz dance skills with intermediate techniques and routines.

courses.title: Tap Dance
courses.description: Learn the foundational steps and rhythms of tap dance. Great for all skill levels.
